attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This treaty has now been rejected by the good people of Eire and we should do the same.
A referendum was promised in the manifesto of the Labour government and has not been carried out.
The Labour government are breaking the law and the people should have the right to decide.
It is not right that an unelected PM dictates to the Kingdom. Hold the referendum now and then get out of my country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
